reference.title: glossShortForm
reference.shortdesc: The <glossShortForm> element provides a shorter alternative to the primary term specified in the <glossterm> element.

section.note: Any list of alternative terms is, of course, specific to the language, so translation of a glossentry topic may result in an empty <glossShortForm> element if there is no equivalent in the target language.

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <glossentry id="www"> <glossterm>World Wide Web</glossterm> <glossdef>A collection of documents available through the Internet.</glossdef> <glossBody> <glossPartOfSpeech value="noun"/> <glossAlt> <glossShortForm>the Web</glossShortForm> </glossAlt> </glossBody> </glossentry>
